name: Just a Potion Seller
description:
Gameplay:

Play as a slave who sells potions to the Heroes before they march into the Dungeon. 

The dungeon master will set you free if you offer him enough money. However, the payment is nowhere near enough.

As a result, you find yourself bidding your money on where will these Heroes will meet their End.

Bid carefully & wisely. Maybe one day you may find your freedom.
